content.question: Analyze the influence of TWO of the following on American-Soviet relations in the decade following the Second World War. Yalta ConferenceCommunist revolution in China Korean WarMcCarthyism

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
